RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Maiden Special Weight Purse 85000. (UP TO $14,790 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STOLEN MAGIC was well placed just off the pace, saved ground on the turn, was asked outside the quarter-pole, came out into upper stretch then made a bid at the three-sixteenths, gained the lead coming to the furlong marker and edged clear under steady handling. BONUS MOVE was bumped in the hindquarters at the start, moved in while going to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, went around the turn in the two path, was asked at the quarter-pole then came under a drive, lost the advantage near the furlong marker and was outfinished while well clear for the place. WAJDA moved out then tracked the pace on the outside, stalked in the three path on the turn, was given his cue at the quarter-pole then passed the three-sixteenths in the four path, remained on his inside lead in the drive and came up empty while clear for the show. LIVEHAPPY tossed his head at the start then lunged and was off slow, checked between horses shortly thereafter, spotted the front many lengths, saved ground on the turn and was no factor. SARDIS broke in and bumped the hindquarters of a foe while off a bit slow then was taken up with a snatch of the right-rein, spotted the front several lengths, was urged along in the two path on the turn and failed to threaten. ALLEGRINI hit the inside of the gate then veered in before being corrected by the rider and was off slow, spotted the front several lengths, went around the turn in the three path and also was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Stolen Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed,ins turn,came out 1/4,bid3/16,lead1/8,edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Wajda
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd out,tracked outside,3p turn,ask1/4,4p3/16,left lead,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Bonus Move
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd hindquarters brk,mvd in,pace,2p turn,headed1/8,outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Sardis
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in,bmpd,tkn up right-rein,off slow,2path turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Livehappy
ENTRY.OWNER: A P Stable and Fox Tale Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: toss head brk,lunged,off slow,checked,ins turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Allegrini
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate,veer in,off slow,settled outside,3p turn,no factor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Claiming Purse 36000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be V oid).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AULA three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths and advanced, swung three wide into upper stretch, took over command with three-sixteenths to go and drew clear under a drive to prevail. WATCH HILL showed the way in hand three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, got collared with three-sixteenths to go and ran on to chase the winner home clear of the rest and along second best. DUDLEY DICKERSON bobbled at the break, chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, stayed on one paced to the finish. MUNNY FOR NUTHIN chased just off the inside under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, weakened. WAFLR chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, tired. SILENT RUNNING chased along the inside under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, cornered from the two path into upper stretch and tired in the drive. LOOKIN' TO WIN a bit fractious prior to the start, stumbled badly at the start recovering outwards and getting away last, conceded eight to nine lengths to the front before being able to settle into stride, chased five wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch and was unable to make an impact. KNOCKZCATOFFZFENCE chased four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, tired and was eased home through the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Silent Running
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 7/16, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Munny for Nuthin
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 7/16, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Waflr
ENTRY.OWNER: Siegel Sez Stables and Shaw Ken
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Knockzcatoffzfence
ENTRY.OWNER: Flying P Stable and Krakow Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4w, coaxed 3/8, angled 5-6w upper, tired, eased home

ENTRY.NAME: Dudley Dickerson
ENTRY.OWNER: Kasey K Racing Stable LLC Day Michael R and Moore Michael M
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobble st, chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Watch Hill
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, collared 3/16, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Lookin' to Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled badly st, chased 5w, coaxed 7/16, 7w uppr, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Aula
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 38, advanced 3w upper, up 3/16, drew clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 3 1 1/16M Outer turf CR: 99. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 95000. OUTER TURF (UP TO $16,530 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 1 22 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUNNING BEE angled in while going to the front, went around the first turn in the two path, showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside on the far turn, responded well when set down into upper stretch then extended the advantage, came under a right-handed crop outside the furlong marker and powered home determinedly to prove much the best. CRABS N BEER traveled around the first turn in the two path, settled off the pace, was roused along the rail on the far turn and earned the place while no match for the winner. EMARAATY (GB) broke through the front of the gate prior to the start, was brought back around and reloaded, saved ground while well placed in hand just off the pace, came out into upper stretch, pursued the winner into the final furlong and weakened but held the show. WOW WHATA SUMMER settled on the inside, was urged along on the far turn and lacked the needed response. OCALA DREAM rounded the opening bend in the two path, settled towards the back, was roused in the two path on the far turn, swung five wide into the stretch and failed to rally. HIGH TIDE went five then four wide on the first turn, prompted the pace on the outside, was asked in the two path on the far turn, chased while coming out some into upper stretch and capitulated. MAXWELL ESQUIRE was hustled from the gate, went three wide on the first turn, settled off the pace, was asked in the two path on the far turn, spun three wide into the stretch then moved further out and failed to respond. NOLO CONTESTO was hustled from the gate, went four wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, drop back three then four wide on the far turn, floated six wide into the stretch and had nothing left. CARPENTERS CALL was last to commence then hustled before being taken in hand, raced inside for most of the first turn then moved to the two path, settled at the back, rounded the far turn in the three path and showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Ocala Dream
ENTRY.OWNER: Dubb Michael Bouchey Steven and America's Pastime Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,settled,roused 2p2nd turn,swung 5w1/4,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Emaraaty (GB)
ENTRY.OWNER: Dubb Michael Madaket Stables LLC and Caruso Michael J
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk thru gate,well placed ins,came out 1/4,chased,wknd,held3rd

ENTRY.NAME: High Tide
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-4p1st,prompt outside,ask 2p2nd turn,came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Carpenters Call
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,hustled,in hand,ins-2p1st,at rear,3p2nd,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Wow Whata Summer
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside,urged 2nd turn,lacked needed response

ENTRY.NAME: Crabs N Beer
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,settled,roused rail 2nd turn,no match,along for place

ENTRY.NAME: Nolo Contesto
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,4w1st,settled outside,3-4w2nd turn,6w1/4,nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Running Bee
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in,2p1st,showed way,ins2nd,ask1/4,kicked clear,driving

ENTRY.NAME: Maxwell Esquire
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,3p1st,settled,2p2nd turn,3path1/4,moved out,empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: M B'S MUNNING led briefly early on before chasing three wide stacked between foes in aim of the leader, had GUN MAESTRO and HATCH tuck in a path from the outside nearing the half mile pole and got shuffled out from between foes when eased off into the turn, tipped out five wide placed to coaxing at the seven-sixteenths and began a steady advance, swung six wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command nearing the eighth pole, then edged clear to the finish kept to task. PREDICTED chased three then two wide until briefly tucked to the inside at the half mile pole, came under coaxing just off the inside at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch and kicked on belatedly to secure the place honors. GUN MAESTRO just off the pace six paths off the inside down the backstretch, advanced into the turn tucking four wide to vie outside a trio for command coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch kept on to preserve the show honors. BAD LARRY established the front a furlong into the running and showed the way narrowly over a quartet in hand along the inside, vied inside a trio through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch clinging to the front, got displaced nearing the eighth pole and weakened in the late stages. FLASH KISS bobbled at the break, chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. HATCH forwardly placed five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three wide into the turn advancing to vie for command between rivals under coaxing from three furlongs out, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. LEGENDARY LORE chased just off the inside and then along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and offered no response. SORPRESO chased in the overland route six to seven paths off the inside down the backstretch and then five wide through the turn under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, went six wide into upper stretch and came up empty. BUILT TO LAST fractious in the gate prior to the start, raced forwardly placed holding narrow and brief command with six furlongs to go before settling in closest aim of the leader, advanced in the turn to vie for the front just off the inside between foes and under coaxing from midway, continued in the two path at the head of the stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Bad Larry
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, vied ins trio turn, coaxed 3/8, ins 1/4, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Built to Last
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, led briefly 2p, vied 2p turn, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: M B's Munning
ENTRY.COMMENT: led briefly, chased 3w, shuffled 1/2, 5w turn, 6w uppr, edged clr

ENTRY.NAME: Flash Kiss
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobble st, chased ins, coaxed 2p 3/8, 3w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Hatch
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 5w, vied 3w betw turn, 3w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Sorpreso
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6-7w backstretch, 5w turn, coaxed 7/16, 6w upper, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Legendary Lore
ENTRY.OWNER: Epona Racing Stable and Toga Party Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed inside 3/8, inside 1/4, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Gun Maestro
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w backstretch, vied 4w turn, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Predicted
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, to ins 1/2, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, belatedly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 76. Maiden Special Weight Purse 70000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BRICK AMBUSH drifted out early, tracked the pace on the outside, was asked while two then three wide on the turn, took the lead at the quarter-pole then shook clear, responded well in the final furlong and held under steady urging. INONIT broke in and bumped with a foe, settled on the outside, was urged in the two path on the turn and improved for the place. VIN SANTO was hustled from the gate, settled off the pace, advanced late on the backstretch, saved ground on the turn, shifted to the two path outside the quarter-pole, moved out in upper stretch and lacked the needed kick while clear for the show. QUIET WISDOM was sent hard to the front, showed the way with a clear advantage, raced inside on the turn, lost the lead at the quarter-pole and tired. PROPHETIC was ridden along on the outside, went three to four wide on the turn and failed to respond. JUDGE RULES was bumped at the start then forced into another rival, went three wide on the turn and was no factor. SWEET TONE bumped with a rival at the start, raced at the rear, moved from the rail to the two path on the turn and showed little. PODERE was urged along off the pace, came up empty on the turn and retreated then was eased but walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Quiet Wisdom
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and St Elias Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard,clear pace,inside turn,headed1/4,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Brick Ambush
ENTRY.COMMENT: drift out early,tracked outside,2-3p turn,lead1/4,edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Podere
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along, empty ins-2path turn, retreated, eased, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Prophetic
ENTRY.COMMENT: ridden along outside, 3-4wide turn, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Vin Santo
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,settled,advanced 1/2,inside turn,mvd out,lckd needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Tone
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, well back, ins-2path turn, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Judge Rules
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,urged along,3wide turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Inonit
ENTRY.OWNER: The Estate of Richard J Lugovich
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in,bmpd,settled outside,urged 2path turn,improved for 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Tepin S. AQUEDUCT RACE 6 1M Turf CR: 86. Stakes Purse 120000. FOR FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $120 each which should accompany the nomination; $600 to pass the entry box and an additional $600 to start. For ho rses not originally nominated, a supplemental nomination payment of $600 In addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the owner of the winner, 20% to second, 12% to thir d, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners of a race other than maiden, claiming, starter or state-bred allowance allowed 2 lbs.; maidens allowed 4 lbs. A presentation will be made tot he winning owner. The New York Racing Association reserves the right to transfer this race to the main track. Closed Saturday, November 4, 2023 with 25 Original Nominations and 1 Supplement. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on thh
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MEMORIALIZE chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, offered up a good finish to close in on the outside through the final furlong and was up in the last jumps to prevail. AWESOME CZECH coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand just off the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch, edged away under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in and was nailed in the final strides to the wire. GOLD LIGHTNING chased two to three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, continued two to three wide into upper stretch, ran on to secure the show honors. ARTEMIS GIRL chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch and stayed on one paced to the finish. BEING BETTY brushed the off side stall at the start, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and made no headway. VOTER REGISTRATION (FR) chased just off the inside near the rear of the field, came under brief coaxing inside at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Artemis Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: Donk David G Behrendt John T Marquis Charles K Haslup Suzanne K Carney Sean Punk
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, inside 1/4, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Memorialize
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, good finish, up last jumps

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Czech
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 2p, coaxed 1/4, ins 1/4, dug in, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Being Betty
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed gate, chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, no headway

ENTRY.NAME: Voter Registration (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, 2w 1/4p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Lightning
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 5/16, 2-3w upper, ran on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 101. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 95000. (UP TO $16,530 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON $60,000 IN 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRIC E OF $80,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KINETIC SKY settled on the outside, was roused four wide on the turn, turned into the stretch under the crop, pursued the leading duo under a drive into the final sixteenth and got up under strong urging to prevail. GUN IT broke very alertly from the outside post, moved in while going to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, went around the turn in the two path, was asked near the quarter-pole then came under a drive while remaining on his inside lead, dueled inside of BABY YODA into the final furlong, drifted out under a left-handed crop while continuing on his left-lead outside the sixteenth-pole, led into the final sixteenth but was overtaken while able to get the place. BABY YODA was hustled from the gate, chased the pace on the outside then in the three path on the turn, made an outside bid in upper stretch, dueled with the runner-up into the final sixteenth and was outfinished while clear for the show. SCARAMOUCHE was well placed just off the pace, chased inside on the turn, came off the rail in upper stretch and weakened. NOVA RAGS was restless in the gate, lunged at the start and was off slow, spotted the front a couple lengths, settled on the outside, angled in late on the backstretch, was roused in the two path on the turn and failed to threaten. CHEWING GUM settled off the pace, was roused while moving from the two path to the four path on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. SYNTHESIS settled off the pace, was urged along late on the backstretch, moved from three to five wide on the turn, spun six wide into the stretch and failed to threaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Chewing Gum
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, asked 2-4path turn, 5p into lane, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Synthesis
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,urged 1/2,3-5w turn,6w into lane, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Scaramouche
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, chased inside turn, 2path 3/16, weakened

ENTRY.OWNER: Pantofel Stable LLC Wachtel Stable Barber Gary and Zaro Jerold L
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,chased outside,3path turn,bid3/16,dueled,outfinished

ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Kahn Alan Tanzman David and Speranza Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside,roused 4w turn,crop into lane,chased duo,up late

ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate,lunged,off slow,angled in 1/2,2p turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Gun It
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly,pace,2path turn,ask1/4,inside lead,drift1/16,overtkn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Autumn Days S. AQUEDUCT RACE 8 6F Outer turf CR: 98. Stakes Purse 150000. OUTER TURF FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $150 each which should accompany the nomination; $750 to pass the entry box and a n additional $750 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $750 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the owner of the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weights; Three year olds, 123 lbs.; Older 125 lbs. Non-winners of a sweepstake in 2023 allowed 3 lbs.; of two races other than maiden, claiming, st arter or state-bred allowance in 2023 allowed 5 lbs. A presentation will be made to the winning owner. The New York Racing Association reserves the right to transfer this race to the main track. Closed Saturday, November 4, 2023 with 20 Original Nominatio
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LADY MILAGRO coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside through swift splits, got set down spinning three wide into upper stretch, drew off under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in under a drive holding well and clear to the finish kept busy to the end. DANSE MACABRE chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. ALL THAT MAGIC chased just off the inside and then along the inside coming under coaxing three furlongs out, angled six wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. STERLING SILVER chased along the inside, was patiently handled until set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid. LOON CRY three then two wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, ran on through to the finish. POPPY FLOWER four then three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled eight wide into upper stretch and made some headway through to the finish while outkicked by the top ones. ITSAKEYPER chased along the inside, got roused spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, made no impact. SALVAJE chased along the inside under a ride from the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened. HEADLAND chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four to five wide at the top of the stretch, weakened in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: All That Magic
ENTRY.OWNER: Demasi Kathleen A and Spedale Family Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, angled 6w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Milagro
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, set down 3w upper, drew off, held well

ENTRY.NAME: Sterling Silver
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, set down 2w 1/4p, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Loon Cry
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, angled 4w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Salvaje
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Poppy Flower
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, angled 8w upper, some headway

ENTRY.OWNER: Brockley Thomas and Brockley Daryn A
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, angled 4-5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Danse Macabre
ENTRY.OWNER: NBS Stable and Elements Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, angled 7w upper, mild kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 9 1 1/16M Turf CR: 81. Maiden Special Weight Purse 70000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Pre ferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROAGNA went around the first turn in the two path, moved out early on the backstretch, settled outside without cover starting before the nine-sixteenths, was roused four then five wide on the final turn, rallied six wide into the stretch, closed fast to get the lead at the furlong marker then powered away to prove much the best in an impressive debut. SAINTE CHAPELLE was well placed just off the pace on the inside, came under encouragement on the far turn, shifted to the two path at the quarter-pole, took a short lead in upper stretch, lost the advantage to the winner at the furlong marker and proved no match while just able to hold the place. VOLEUSE was hustled from the gate then taken in hand early, saved ground while rated off the pace, waited off heels into upper stretch, was roused inside the furlong marker, raced along the rail while crowded a bit in the final furlong and finished willingly to just miss the place while clear for the show. TURRIGA went three to four wide on the first turn, was rated on the outside, came under urging in the three path on the far turn, spun four wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. SHELLY saved ground on the first turn, settled near the middle of the field, was roused in the two path on the far turn and failed to rally. LADY LAOBAN went three wide on the first turn, settled off the pace, traveled three then four wide on the far turn, was roused outside the quarter-pole and also failed to rally. MALU checked in traffic leaving the chute, went two to three wide on the turns, came five wide into the stretch and was no factor. STARTS NOW was fractious in the gate, went to the front, raced inside to the two path on the first turn, showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside on the far turn, lost the advantage in upper stretch and gave way. MISS FASHIONISTA saved ground on both turns and failed to threaten. ACCELERINA rounded the first turn in the two to three path, stalked the pace on the outside, was asked in the two path on the final turn, chased three wide into the stretch and came up empty. SHE'S A NATURAL was keen under restraint early, went four wide on the turns, came six wide into the stretch and failed to respond. BOSTON STRONG MAMA traveled around the opening bend in the two path, settled off the pace, was asked in the two path on the far turn and also failed to respond. THREE-QUARTER FRACTION WAS HAND-TIMED DUE TO A TIMING ISSUE AND PROVIDED BY THE NYRA STEWARD

ENTRY.NAME: Roagna
